info.name: Google Apps fixes 4 Midnight Surfing
info.description:
I love Midnight Surfing theme... So, I created new styles in order to make some Google Apps fit.
Currently styling Gmail (using its dark theme), docs and spreadsheets.
info.additionalInfo: Install Midnight Surfing along with this theme: http://userstyles.org/styles/23516/midnight-surfing-global-dark-style
